description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in aitool Ai Auto Tool Content Writing Assistant (Gemini Writer, ChatGPT ) All in One allows Server Side Request Forgery. This issue affects Ai Auto Tool Content Writing Assistant (Gemini Writer, ChatGPT ) All in One: from n/a through 2.2.6.

product.name: Ai Auto Tool Content Writing Assistant (Gemini Writer, ChatGPT ) All in One
